messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

weekly review to ad import to be completed by tomorrow july review entries mobiles dear please log person logs take ownership progress due name category application client summary weekly review ad import completed by tomorrow description please review entries mobiles locations phone corresponding format order import ad successful xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx xx xxx xxx xx more details how phone updated available hardware procedure section after performing needs raised import ad name inventory priority assigned thank kind regards reference reoccurring information confidential legally privileged intended solely addressee opinions expressed mine necessarily represent opinions susceptible interference intended recipient
